income_messages:
From: w*************7@gmail.com
To: CRAWLER
Time: 2023-03-23 22:02:55
SUBJECT:   Dear Sir,
  Dear Sir,
As you can see the president has given the final directive to the
governor of the CBN and in line of the president directive the DEBT
APPROPRIATION MANAGEMENT was established for the process.
I noticed your payment was included in the recent released government
official gazette in respect of the payment of the debt.
I believe you have seen or read the gazette of the payment on the
pages of the newspapers published a week ago. They even published
names of the beneficiaries to benefit the payment from the established
agency and your name was among the names mentioned. It was based on
that I have to contact you so you can expedite the action to have your
debt fund paid now to you.
However, my name is Mr. Wilson Ogunleye, and work in the Central Bank
of Nigeria and was drafted to the Debt Appropriation Management as the
Apex bank representative and I have been the brain behind the release
of your fund.
Please don’t take me as one who is wicked as I have nothing in mind
against you but my anger was vested on your so called partner whom
diverged from our early agreement when he request I assist place your
payment in the system of the computer that process payment to
beneficiaries, which I did and having seen it is done he absconded
never keep the agreement, it was on that reason I stopped your
payment.
Well, as much as I will not explaining in details on what transpired
between your so called partner and I as that will take much of our
time, I would consider dealing with you directly than this person you
called your partner.
And before we can accomplish this I will want you promise me the
following and hoping you will not deviate from this as the way your
partner did in the past.
That you have to keep your so called partner out of this as I will not
want him to know my involvement until the fund is received by you.
That you will be willing to offer me the 25% of the fund if you
receive the fund in your account.
When the fund is received in your account, you will assist my coming
over to meet you by given me a letter of invitation.
And will help me open account in one of the choice bank in your
location where I will lodge my share and possible help me in what
business I can invest in. I wouldn’t want to receive my share here
because of the query by the authority that will follow to know the
source.
Well, other things will follow when we meet face to face in your country.
On this note I await for your expedient response and by the time I
receive your response I will inform you of how to get your payment
without any upfront payment.
Send your reply through this email: 
wilsonogunleye7@gmail.com
I Remain Respectively Yours,
Mr. Wilson Ogunleye.   
From: w*************7@gmail.com
To: qg61149@m**************m
Time: 2023-03-27 14:24:53
SUBJECT: Re: Dear Sir,
Mr. Ramos, you haven't ask the question you said to ask. I am still
waiting to hear from you.
From: w*************7@gmail.com
To: qg61149@m**************m
Time: 2023-03-28 21:40:41
SUBJECT: Form
Sherri Ramos
Sir,
Anyway, I don’t have to explain more as I hope you have read from my last
mail what the grievances I had against your partner.
Well as much as I don’t want this take much of my time in explaining what
transpired between us which will be a repetition of the matter as was in my
previous mail but since you now involved me assisting you, I expect your
confirmation of the following and with the intention you keep to it when
you have received the fund.
1. The first, what do you have to me when you receive the fund.( Please let
it not worry you of what to say to offer. Just in your mind say what you
will offer me. Will consider what you say, it’s your money and not mine).
2.      The second demand, please keep away your so called partner out of
this as I wouldn’t him know I am helping you to claim the fund.
3. The third was I demand you keep our involvement secret because if the
office comprehends I was assisting for a monetary compensation I will be
punished.
Furthermore, I shall be in the office making sure you get things right,
helping in necessary requirements to necessitate the release of the fund to
you.
Meanwhile, I have sent to you through the attachment PROCESSING FORM you
are to fill in your information and send to me for submission to the
reactivation office for the process.
Please, if you have any personal information you feel can assist me pursue
the payment of your debt here, do not be reluctant letting me know.
I wish you reach me on my personal telephone number +234-7016-150140 if
there’s any question you have for me. Also, I shall require you telephone
or other contact means we can make use of as we shall not always depend on
writing mails especially when there’s important information to pass over.
Thank you as I wait for your response.
Mr. Wilson Ogunleye.
